item.title: Azure Powershell
item.description: Naming Conventions> Naming Conventions # Prefix: Azure: Older prefix for Azure PowerShell cmdlets. Rm: Resource Manager (older prefix). Az: Newer prefix for Azure PowerShell cmdlets. Actions: Get-: Returns an object. e.
